plot: When her beloved Grandmother finally dies, a part of Sam's life is also over. Her new life is a party, but at some point she will have to go home and face reality.
title: Samantha
plot_es: When her beloved Grandmother finally dies, a part of Sam's life is also over. Her new life is a party, but at some point she will have to go home and face reality.
plot_en: When her beloved Grandmother finally dies, a part of Sam's life is also over. Her new life is a party, but at some point she will have to go home and face reality.
